posts.post_content:
1880's CDV (2 1/2" x 3 3/4") of two players in a staged action shot, similar to several Old Judge cards.  $sold (check or m.o.).  

Rob M

Edited to add - Weird that the photo shows up correctly on my Windows computer and my Mac computer but it's upside down on my ipad and iphone. Anybody else?

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=250598&d=1478644311[/IMG]

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=250599&d=1478644332[/IMG]

There!  Now one of these should be right side up no matter what viewer you're using!!

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=250639&d=1478652729[/IMG]
[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=250640&d=1478652705[/IMG]
It was always right side up for me......even in the first post. Good luck!
FWIW, the first photo is the right side up on my PC, but upside down on my iPhone.

[quote name="Baseball Rarities" post=1601131]FWIW, the first photo is the right side up on my PC, but upside down on my iPhone.[/QUOTE]

Exactly,  that's what I keep seeing as well.  I can't quite figure out why.  I'm guessing it is something to do with Microsoft and Apple not jiving sometimes.

Price just lowered to $sold (check or m.o.)

Rob M
